question_id: Bahan apa saja yang paling sering muncul di seluruh resep? Tampilkan nama bahan dan total kemunculannya.
sql_query:
SELECT
  b.nama_bahan,
  SUM(r.jumlah) AS total_kemunculan
FROM Bahan AS b
JOIN RESEP_BAHAN AS r ON b.id_bahan = r.id_bahan
GROUP BY
  b.nama_bahan
ORDER BY
  total_kemunculan DESC
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  b.nama_bahan,
  SUM(r.jumlah) AS total_kemunculan
FROM Bahan AS b
JOIN RESEP_BAHAN AS r ON b.id_bahan = r.id_bahan
GROUP BY
  b.nama_bahan
ORDER BY
  total_kemunculan DESC;
```
